French: Je voudrais une salade de poulet pour commencer.
English: I would like a chicken salad to start.

French: Pouvez-vous recommander un restaurant japonais près de chez moi?
English: Can you recommend a Japanese restaurant near my place?

French: J'aime beaucoup les crêpes suzettes, mais j'ai already tried them twice this week.
English: I really like crepes Suzette, but I've already had them twice this week.

French: Cet assiette de fromage est délicieuse, mais je suis still rather full from dinner.
English: This cheese plate is delicious, but I'm still quite full from dinner.

French: Je voudrais une portion de gnocchi pour mon repas.
English: I would like a serving of gnocchi for my meal.
